nodes.text: Palme du Tigre was a planet with a wide variety of terrain, which included jungles, deserts, plains, mountains, and seas.
Its indigenous humanoids, the Palmiens, had a pre-spatial level of technology.
The Empire trained numerous non-clone stormtrooper recruits on the planet. The final test of their training was to commit genocide of the native population.
"Palme du Tigre" is French for "Tiger's Palm".
